findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions addAdmin() and removeAdmin() iterate through admin list using a loop, which could lead to an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there are too many admin addresses.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges including adding/removing admins, withdrawing ERC20 tokens, changing certain block values, and pausing/unpausing staking.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to a denial-of-service attack due to the block gas limit.
